feature.description: RoQME Plugins. "RoQME: Dealing with non-functional properties through global Robot Quality-of-Service Metrics" was an Integrated Technical Project (ITP) funded in the context of the EU H2020 RobMoSys project. RoQME provides software engineers with methods and tools to deal with system-level non-functional properties, enabling the specification of global Quality-of-Service (QoS) metrics in robotics.
